name: Duck Boy Demo
description:
Collect all the bread to open the portal and reach the portal to complete the stage!

Avoid enemies and hazards are are out to get you!

Each stage gets progressively more difficult.

Can you manage to obtain a score of 100'000?

Controls: Arrow keys and WASD keys are available to move in  4 different directions. You can also swipe the screen on touch screens, or move the mouse while left clicked to change direction.

Full game available on Google Play.
